text: John Tomlinson (born 20 October 1933) is a British former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:British male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Great Britain Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Preston, Lancashire
title: John Tomlinson (sport shooter)
